# **Datathon Resource Repository**

<!--- ### *Resource Repository* {style="padding-top: 0px;"} --->
This site is a catalog of projects and datasets relevant to datathons and similar events sponsored by or held in collaboration with the [California State Water Resources Control Board](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/). Click on any of the tabs at the top of this page to find resources related to that topic area.

This site is maintained by the Water Board's Office of Information Management and Analysis, and will be continually updated as new resources are made available. If you'd like to suggest a resource to add, please send a message to <waterdata@waterboards.ca.gov>.
